Nirmaya Health Initiative Overview
==================================

Introduction
------------
The Nirmaya Health Initiative is a comprehensive program designed to address 
chronic health challenges in underserved communities across India. Founded in 
2024, the initiative combines cutting-edge research with community-based 
interventions.

Key Focus Areas
---------------
1. Nutrition Education
   - Community workshops on balanced diets
   - School meal programs
   - Home gardening initiatives

2. Preventive Care
   - Regular health screenings
   - Vaccination drives
   - Health awareness campaigns

3. Mental Health Support
   - Counseling services
   - Stress management programs
   - Community support groups

Research Division
-----------------
Dr. Sarah Chen leads the research division, overseeing studies on:
- Nutritional deficiencies in rural areas
- Impact of clean water access on community health
- Mental health stigma reduction strategies
